script.title: Bulk Targeter For DV360
script.description: Allows bulk targeting DV360 through Sheets and BigQuery.
instructions: Select Load Partners, save the recipe, then run. A Sheet called DV_Targeter_{field:recipe_name} will be created.
In the 'Partners' sheet tab, fill in Partners tab filter.
Select Load Advertisers, save the recipe, then run.
In the 'Advertisers' sheet tab, fill in Advertisers tab filter.
Now, select Load Line Items, save the recipe, then run.
To update, fill in changes on all tabs with colored fields (RED FIELDS ARE NOT IMPLEMENTED, IGNORE).
Select Preview, save the recipe, then run the recipe.
To commit updates, select Update, save the recipe, then run.
Update can be run multiple times.
